verses.roman:
mora vaṁśī-gīte ākarṣaye tri-bhuvana
rādhāra vacane hare āmāra śravaṇa

synonyms: mora—My; vaṁśī-gīte—by the vibration of the flute; ākarṣaye—I attract; tri-bhuvana—the three worlds; rādhāra vacane—the words of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; hare—conquers; āmāra—My; śravaṇa—hearing power.
translation: "The vibration of My transcendental flute attracts the three worlds, but My ears are enchanted by the sweet words of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī.
